trans-unit.source: SqlCredential provides a more secure way to specify the password for a login attempt using [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Authentication.
trans-unit.target: SqlCredential fornece uma forma mais segura para especificar a palavra-passe para uma tentativa de início de sessão utilizando [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] autenticação.

trans-unit.source: SqlCredential is comprised of a user id and a password that will be used for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Authentication.
trans-unit.target: SqlCredential é composta por um id de utilizador e uma palavra-passe que será utilizada para [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] autenticação.

trans-unit.source: The password in a SqlCredential object is of type <xref href="System.Security.SecureString"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-passe num objeto SqlCredential é do tipo <xref href="System.Security.SecureString"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SqlCredential cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: SqlCredential não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Windows Authentication (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>) remains the most secure way to log in to a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação do Windows (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>) continua a forma mais segura para iniciar sessão para um [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] base de dados.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> to get or set a connection's SqlCredential object.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>obter ou definir o objeto de SqlCredential de uma ligação.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword%2A> to change the password for a SqlCredential object.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword%2A>para alterar a palavra-passe para um objeto de SqlCredential.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on how a SqlCredential object affects connection pool behavior, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como um objeto de SqlCredential afeta o comportamento de agrupamento de ligação, consulte [SQL Server ligação agrupamento (ADO.NET)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception will be raised if a non-null SqlCredential object is used in a connection with any of the following connection string keywords: - `Integrated Security = true` - `Password` - `User ID` - `Context Connection = true` The following sample connects to a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database using <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>: ``` // change connection string in the APP.CONFIG file <connectionStrings> <add name="MyConnString" connectionString="Initial Catalog=myDB;Server=myServer" providerName="System.Data.SqlClient" /> </connectionStrings> // then use the following snippet: using System.Configuration; System.Windows.Controls.TextBox txtUserId = new System.Windows.Controls.TextBox(); System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox txtPwd = new System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox(); Configuration config = Configuration.WebConfigurationManager.OpenWebConfiguration(Null); ConnectionStringSettings connString = config.ConnectionStrings.ConnectionString[“MyConnString”]; using (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connString.ConnectionString)) { SecureString pwd = txtPwd.SecurePassword; pwd.MakeReadOnly(); SqlCredential cred = new SqlCredential(txtUserId.Text, pwd); conn.Credential = cred; conn.Open(); ```
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>exceção será desencadeada se for utilizado um objeto de SqlCredential não nulo numa ligação com todas as palavras-chave da cadeia de ligação seguintes:- `Integrated Security = true` - `Password` - `User ID` - `Context Connection = true` o exemplo seguinte liga a um [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] da base de dados utilizando <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>: ``` // change connection string in the APP.CONFIG file <connectionStrings> <add name="MyConnString" connectionString="Initial Catalog=myDB;Server=myServer" providerName="System.Data.SqlClient" /> </connectionStrings> // then use the following snippet: using System.Configuration; System.Windows.Controls.TextBox txtUserId = new System.Windows.Controls.TextBox(); System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox txtPwd = new System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox(); Configuration config = Configuration.WebConfigurationManager.OpenWebConfiguration(Null); ConnectionStringSettings connString = config.ConnectionStrings.ConnectionString[“MyConnString”]; using (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connString.ConnectionString)) { SecureString pwd = txtPwd.SecurePassword; pwd.MakeReadOnly(); SqlCredential cred = new SqlCredential(txtUserId.Text, pwd); conn.Credential = cred; conn.Open(); ``` </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Creates an object of type <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto do tipo <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constructor does not accept null parameters.
trans-unit.target: O construtor não aceita parâmetros nulos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String.Empty> value is allowed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String.Empty>valor é permitido.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: An attempt to pass a null parameter in the constructor will raise an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Uma tentativa para transmitir um parâmetro nulo no construtor emitirá um <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>exceção.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The user id.
trans-unit.target: O id de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The password; a <xref href="System.Security.SecureString"></xref> value marked as read-only.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-passe; um <xref href="System.Security.SecureString"> </xref> valor marcado como só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Passing a read/write <xref href="System.Security.SecureString"></xref> parameter will raise an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Transmissão de leitura/escrita <xref href="System.Security.SecureString"> </xref> parâmetro emitirá um <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: Returns the password component of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o componente de palavra-passe do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the password component of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o componente de palavra-passe do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the user ID component of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o componente de ID de utilizador do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the user ID component of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object..
trans-unit.target: Devolve o componente de ID de utilizador do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> objeto...
